articles.author: Helen Sullivan, Clea Skopeliti, Tom Ambrose, Anne Davies, Melissa Davey, Tess McClure
articles.title: Coronavirus live news: WHO monitoring new Mu variant; stark Covid divides could shape Europe for generations – study - The Guardian
articles.description: Mu has been designated a ‘variant of interest’ and has mutations suggesting it could be more resistant to vaccines; nationwide booster campaign to begin in French care homes on 12 September

articles.title: UK pledge to take 20,000 Afghan refugees could create ‘pull effect for migrants’ - Telegraph.co.uk
articles.description: Germany says European Union should support refugees as close to Afghanistan as possible as it rules out bloc-wide target
articles.content:
Angela Merkel, the chancellor who threw open Germany's borders during the 2015 migration crisis, said the EU should support refugees as close to Afghanistan and as far away from Europe as possible.

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Two Nigerian states try out COVID vaccine passes - Eyewitness News
articles.description: Health passes or vaccine passports, required for entry to places like restaurants, gyms and cinemas, are already in place in some European countries though they have triggered protests in France, Greece and Italy as unfair to the unvaccinated.
articles.content: Health passes or vaccine passports, required for entry to places like restaurants, gyms and cinemas, are already in place in some European countries though they have triggered protests in France, Gre… [+3141 chars]

articles.title: WHO sounds alarm over rising COVID deaths in Europe - The Online Citizen Asia
articles.description: The Online Citizen Asia WHO sounds alarm over rising COVID deaths in Europe Health
